A nor'easter has caused significant disruptions in NYC, including road closures in Hoboken and a tragic incident involving an elderly woman killed by a flying solar panel, while the mayoral race heats up with candidates like Mamdani and Cuomo vying for support amid rising food costs and tenant complaints.

### Risks & Alerts

- Elderly woman killed by flying solar panel in Brooklyn as nor'easter hit NYC with strong winds. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Road closed in Hoboken as nor'easter continues. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- Broadway musicians and actors are considering strikes, potentially impacting NYC theater productions.
